                          com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.SmartListActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass>
Type Parameters:
AggregateClass - the aggregate class accessible though the SmartActivity.setAggregate(Object) and SmartActivity.getAggregate() methods
BusinessObjectClass - the business objects being handled
ViewClass - the View representation of the business objects
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, AppPublics.LifeCyclePublic, SmartableActivity<AggregateClass>, Smarted<AggregateClass>, DetailsProvider.ForList<BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass>, DetailsProvider.ForListHandler<BusinessObjectClass>, DetailsProvider.ForListView<BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass>, LifeCycle, WrappedListView.OnEventObjectListener<BusinessObjectClass>
public abstract class SmartListActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass extends android.view.View>
extends AbstractSmartListActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass,android.widget.ListView,ViewClass>

An instantiation of the AbstractSmartListActivity bound to the native ListView.

Since:
2011.06.15
Author:
Édouard Mercier
